website_summaries.verdict: A versatile blender with presets for all sorts of kitchen tasks. Great for home chefs looking for a workhorse appliance.
pros: Great looking blender with intuitive touch controls
Presets feature easy to interpret icons for crushing ice, blending soups, and making ice cream
Blades are easy and safe to clean
Bottom portion of the blender wipes down easily thanks to the sleek interface
cons: Lightweight design means blender does move around more than some would have liked

website_summaries.verdict: Do you really need a 9-in-1 kitchen appliance? If you aren't planning to make massive quantities of nut butter (or other relatively obscure things) regularly, you might actually prefer something less intense.
pros: The Blendtec Designer Series WildSide Blender can juice, grind, mix, and blend with the best of 'em
It is, in fact, among the best of 'em
cons: The thing costs $454 and it really works best with larger serving sizes
In other words, you better be prepared to make a ton of food to justify this purchase

customer_reviews.title: overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it one star because although the quality is good, it is no better than blenders one third the price. I fell victim to an overzealous ad campaign. I would highly recommend not spending such an obscene amount of money for this average blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Three years later, this amazing piece of equipment is still going strong! As vegans, we LOVE this blender!! We make so many dairy alternatives with it--sour cream; queso; milk; ice cream; cheese--it's great!!! My only complaint would be that, from time to time, the jars seem to leak at the bottom. I told the manufacturer about this though, and they sent me a replacement jar with no hesitation! A great product from a great company and a MUST HAVE for any vegans that aren't content with simply eating lettuce and tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Yabbos

customer_reviews.title: Blender broke upon using it for first time.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke when using it for first time during the cleaning cycle. When I moved the base something was rattling around in the base. Very poor results for such a high priced product that is highly touted. Going to try to get my money back and we will see how hard this endeavor will be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blending, zero reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace my previous blendtec which had already been replaced once under warranty, and this one started going bad almost immediately. That makes a total of three bases I've owned (original, warranty replacement, this one) and none of them even made it to 200 uses. The motor bearings go bad and they get incredibly loud and vibrate like crazy (have to hold them in place with your hands). When they are new they work like magic, and I wish they stayed that way, but they just don't. This is on normal food uses like smoothies and soups from their recipe book, nothing unusual.
customer_reviews.author: Benvenuti Sfondrati-Piccolomini

customer_reviews.title: The designer 650 is a great blender and the Blendtec customer service is among the best
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the customer service people at Blendtec are exceptional and have provided the best service one can hope for. They are very pleasant, helpful, and knowledgeable. Now for the reason for 4 star instead of 5: I have 3 Blendtec machines two of them designer series. One of the new designers had to be sent back, but the replacement had to be returned also. A new Designer 650 is on its way via UPS. We use the blenders daily and they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Hamid

customer_reviews.title: Best blender we've ever owned...
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Ninja (that was great for 14 years)... this blender literally pulverizes ANYTHING. Had no idea that a smoothie could actually be SMOOTH. Very, very impressive blender. Great technology, great power, great results. We're in love and use it at least twice a day... every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased new opened the box and tried it out it would start to count down and then with out starting it would shutdown and throw an error code I never once got it to work very disappointed with tech support as well, they had no advice to give.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Barta

customer_reviews.title: It has peformed great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago and in the year use it 2 to 3 times a week. I like the fact that I can mix about anything and it does a great job. I have had great customer service support. They have replaced it once with a upgraded model, which was a bonus. You will be happy and get your value from this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blender!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this blender. Owned a VitaMix before and also loved that. Wanted to try a different kind when it came time to purchase a new one. After reading all the reviews and a bit of online perusing, this one kept coming up. It is a joy to use. It is a bit loud as stated, but I have it in a different room to blend so that I can shut the door if someone else is around that might be disturbed. After you've used it a few times, you get used to it. The end result is the pay off. Perfectly blended smoothies, soups or whatever you may be concocting with their enzymes in tact! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: We love it and use it at least once a day
customer_reviews.text: We love it and use it at least once a day. Pro's: - Fit's on counter under normal height cabinets - Has presets for smoothies, mixer, etc... that work - Two piece lid fits well on mixer jar and allows for adding ingredients without removing the jar - Tells you how many times you've used it. Cons: - Very loud - The Wildside jar has vertical lines on two sides which make it very difficult to use a spatula to get all the blended goodies out The cons are well overshadowed by the pros. So I highly recommend the Blendtec to anyone interested in juicing, smoothie making, and more.
customer_reviews.author: missy is awsome

customer_reviews.title: Too much work but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: When I load the smoothie ingredients into it I have to stand nearby to make sure it doesn't stall out on me. If it needs another oz. or 2 of fluid I have to stand at the ready. Then it restarts and goes the cycle. Then I always have to manually add 30 or so seconds since 60 is never enough. But then I have a good smoothie...
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Working very well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a second high speed blender to supplement my Vitamix and needed it to fit under the cabinets. I haven't had it long but so far it has proven very satisfactory. It is easier to clean than the Vitamix. The height is good, slides under the cabinets. Only negative so far is the lack of writing on the control panel, I would prefer it to the symbols.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Blends very good, but quality is suspect
customer_reviews.text: The blender worked great for a month. But I tried to use it this morning and all it does is buzz for a few seconds and then display error code "E 02". I will calling customer support on Monday and getting a replacement under warranty. If the warranty wasn't for 7 years I'd ask for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: David Brock

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this blender
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this blender. Had been using my brothers Vitamix until he moved out. I like this one better for 2 reasons. First, I don't have to worry about cutting my fingers when cleaning and its easier to clean. (yes I know both can be cleaned running with a little water and a drop of soap) Second, I can walk away and clean up instead of standing and supervising my blender. My only annoyance thus far is trying the Blendtec smoothie recipes is that even though they provided them, some do not call for any where near enough liquid causing the contents to not blend. Other than that I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Conover

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender. I’m still learning to use the settings. It is pretty loud while in use. The biggest problem I have is with the lid. If using the higher speeds you cannot walk away or even let go. I have to hold the lid on or the contents will spew across the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great for anything that you need pulverized
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to use this product for a while before reviewing it. This blendtec change my life forever. I mainly juice, but is not limited to. This thing is great for anything that you need pulverized. Whether its dry grains you need to make fine or frozen fruit for ice cream. If your in the market for a blender, this is the one for you. They also send you great recipes if you register your blender and subscribe to them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. Blends anything with ease. My morning shake is kale, spinach, carrots, grape tomatoes, cucumber, chia seeds, half a protein scoop, a mixture of frozen berries, and maybe some frozen pineapple. Leaves zero chunks and completely blends all of it. Comparatively easy to clean. No blender is super easy to clean. It is well built. It seems like it will last a long time. I like the touch screen, as it is very responsive. Almost as responsive as my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cressley

customer_reviews.title: BLACK DUST, but works well
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well but jumps around more than I'd expect. I had a jar freeze up after about 18 months and they replaced it no problem. However I did notice a TON of black dust from the old jar, and now that I have a brand new jar the same exact thing is occurring. Googling yields a lot of hits for this problem and it apparently is a result of the design. Whenever this blender dies I'm getting a Vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Yeah I changed my mind about it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked good st first, then it quit working. The question mark icon kept coming up. Wouldn't let me blend. When it did blend it was good. But after that it stoped working. Want to try another one to see if it was just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Vorenkamp-Atchley

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite Feature: EASY TO CLEAN! There's no base to unscrew, no sealing ring to remember to remove and put back in place after each use, no liquid leaking out of the bottom because the so called sealing ring doesn't actually seal. Pulse some water and soap in the blender after use and voila! Clean! Brilliant! Also, it blends stuff. Like, really blends ALL the stuff. No more having the odd peach chunk clogging my straw. No more gritty, tiny, blueberry skin flecked textured smoothies. Hallelujah! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Summer O.

customer_reviews.title: Good blender!
customer_reviews.text: Great, heavy duty blender. The fill line is only about halfway up, so you can't grind that much at a time. But it does an excellent job. I've done ice, carrots, nuts, beets, and various other vegetables. It is loud but does a good job and is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K.

customer_reviews.title: Does as promised, very well.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it promises very well. Solid. Very good Made in America quality. Easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.author: Pablo R. Vitaver

customer_reviews.title: I could not be more pleased with this Blendtec Designer Series Blender
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with this Blendtec Designer Series Blender. It is everything that the reviews say about it ! It fits nicely under the cabinets so it can be utilized so easily. You can make so many items so quickly with it and clean up is a snap which makes you want to use it even more. I wish we would have gotten one of these years ago. We are eating so much more healthy food with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased lots of juicer in supermarket. I would say those machines just a waste of money. Just buy this one, it's so powerful, my family are using it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing and constantly find myself thinking up reasons ...
customer_reviews.text: I drink Soylent which makes use of this monster of a blender daily. I love this thing and constantly find myself thinking up reasons to use it outside of what I'd intended it for. I could only imagine the poor souls out there who make non-Soylent food becoming a slave to this device and creating soups, smoothies, and whatever other concoctions this supports! This is expensive for a reason: it's great quality, made to last, and is the star of its class.
customer_reviews.author: Qpzz

customer_reviews.title: ... weird digital display that isn't as user friendly as good old fashion buttons
customer_reviews.text: It has a weird digital display that isn't as user friendly as good old fashion buttons. The bottom part is very large and takes up more counter space than our old model. It does the job, but I don't like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Blendtec! I literally use it every day, Sometimes multiple times a day! I did have to get a new jar, but the warranty took care of that and the new jar was sent to me for free. Blendtec customer service was great, the product is great, and all the food I make in my Blendtec is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a "hot rod" blender!
customer_reviews.text: It comes assembled and ready to plug in and use right out of the box...It has sensible, easy to understand, user friendly controls and is super easy to clean after use. Heavy and rugged enough to turn on high speed and you don't have to hold it or keep your hand over the slid to keep it from turning over or over flowing...You won't be dissapointed with this gem....Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky, Aquia Va.

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. The little touch pad works great, it's much classier looking than the non-designer series blender. My only gripe is the black rubber base that keeps it from moving on the counter rubs off on my countertop and stains, I fixed this by sticking on little clear rubber cabinet spacer thingies to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Quetzal

customer_reviews.title: what a wonderful addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Oh,my... what a wonderful addition to our kitchen. It does what it is supposed to do... blend things, crush ice, and all that, but the thought that was put into how it cleans, and the choices, and the wildSide jar... it has been just a joy to use. Thank you, BlendTec, for thinking of the user when you designed this blender!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Meg

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would give the Blendtec a try. Its good for those of us who like to make smoothies, blend soups, and trend a healthy lifestyle. However all in all in my opinion you cannot beat the Vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: The greatest blender and jar EVER
customer_reviews.text: Oh snap, this could be the greatest blender known to man. I brag to my friends about how amazing my blender is. We love the 'settings' where we can just sit it and it blends as needed. It's powerfulu - and the jar is the greatest jar, also, in the entire realm. Never has there been either a greater jar OR a greater blender ever created by humans, or by alien.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory15

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender! Got in on a really great Amazon deal, and I could not be happier with it! It will blend anything! The WildSide Jar is a nice jar. This blender is sleek, yet heavy-duty. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I do like the job it does on smoothies but it is extremely noisy. The shape of the jar and the fact the blades aren't sharp make it very easy to clean. Part of me wishes I had tried some more, cheaper blenders first, but I am definitely making more healthy smoothies since buying it, so I guess it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You'll be hard pressed to find another like it. I did a lot of research before making this purchase. The only thing I don't like is the size. I personally like cleaned up counter tops. If you use this item daily for nutritional shakes then it's just easier to leave it on the counter. Make sure you hold the lid down the first few times until you get familiar with its power.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: but I am so glad that I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I use this blender everyday now! I never thought an appliance this expensive could be worth it, but I am so glad that I was wrong. I am always using this product for something (I made oatmeal raisin cookies with it the other day and they were really soft and chewy!), and I look forward to looking up recipes in the provided recipe book. I would highly recommend this product to anyone that cooks regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. it is the perfect height to fit on my countertop below my cabinets. I had read reviews that at faster speeds is shakes. I found this to be true but only when I did not have enough ingredients in the machine when the higher speed was used. Overall there is no shaking. The container is easy to clean and so far nothing has stuck to it. I have made salsa's, ice creams, smoothies, shakes and all have turned out wonderful. Have only had for a short time (2 months) and so far pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Guivas-Burford

customer_reviews.title: A Manly Blender
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this blender after using two junk blenders. I make a breakfast smoothie every morning. The blendtec blender seemed like more value for the dollar than the vita-mix. The touch controls are fancy but other than that its practical. The warranty is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is crazy nice.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I should get this or Vitamix. Really glad I got this. Discussion and reviews on BlenderBabes.com really helped with decision. Advantages to both, but for the kind of everyday home cooking we do this has been amazing. I really like that the base is so easy to wipe off. The Wildside container is a really smart design. Got Blendtec Twist Jar and recommended and between the two, we can do everything.
customer_reviews.author: Trajan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Have used for three weeks mainly for making smoothies w/frozen bananas. It does a great job at lower speeds but at higher speeds after ingredients have blended it has an annoying vibration. Not sure if it has to do with the shaft bearing being housed in plastic. Perhaps this natural or perhaps there will be longevity issues. At this price we were thinking it would be till our death do we part. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Vernesco

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy rinse and clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Have been experimenting with different kinds and mixes for healthy smoothies.Blends all types of hard nuts,frozen fruits,ice,etc...thoroughly.Love the simple preset settings.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY NIEVES

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my smoothies. Though it's noisy, it definitely a lot better than my old fashioned blender I was using. Worth the money. Got mine on Amazon Prime Day and haven't regretted it. Definitely recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Ive D

customer_reviews.title: This product has been a life changer for my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life changer for my wife and I. We use this product to blend a green smoothie a day as a meal replacement for breakfast. I've lost over 20 lbs in 1 month with the assistance of this product blending everything I put into it in a very smooth and delicious result.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best blender for most usages
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best blender for most usages. Most people want to make good smoothies and this is the top performer.... the motor is extremely powerful and the dull blades makes clean up a pleasure... the only negative is the noise. If you want to see comparisons reviews google blending with Henry on YouTube...
customer_reviews.author: Andre Williams

customer_reviews.title: I am happy
customer_reviews.text: I do like it. Looks better than the Vitamix. I sent the Vitamix back and sometimes, I miss it. The Blendtec lid does not stay on as well. The blendtec was $100 less and the look and performance is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen accessory, hands down
customer_reviews.text: Or hands on the lid, my only single complaint is the amount of power this machine dishes out sends it slowly drifting on the counter during a cycle, so I hold down at the lid to prevent skidding. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it except how noisy it is. It's very user friendly and simple yet powerful. It's especially good for making smoothies as it leaves no clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Sharanya Venkat

customer_reviews.title: FIRE. 2nd use...not heavy use catches fire
customer_reviews.text: $360 paperweight. I’ve have $20 blenders perform for years. 2nd use and it catches fire. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was my first blender ever and maybe the last ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first blender ever and maybe the last time I buy a blendtec. I bought it 2 years ago and have used it about 5 times to make smoothies and milkshakes. Every time I use it, I have to stop every few seconds to turn the mixture and add liquid to it. Eventually, I end up using more liquid than I intended and my smoothie/milkshake tastes bland. It was definitely not worth the money. I should have went with a vitamix or ninja.
customer_reviews.author: PimbleStuckken

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this blender
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews on the Blendtec and the Vitamix, and went with the Blendtec. I absolutely love this blender! Perfect smoothies and juice. It can pulverize anything! The recipe book is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: rb205

customer_reviews.title: Love my new BlendTek
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my new blender! Best job ever turning y green into smoothies! The pre programmed setting are terrific. Wide side jar cleans up so easily. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Blendec machine is an excellent choice for those who stay in the kitchen frequently
customer_reviews.text: Blendec machine is an excellent choice for those who stay in the kitchen frequently. I love the blendec because it has more than enough power to blend any produce. I justified the price with the fact that I will be used often. I highly recommend this product to people who devote an ample amount of time in the kitchen. I rated this blender a 4 because it is expensive the product delivers in quality and performance, though.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good blender
customer_reviews.text: Love the blender and would recommend this to anyone who is looking for good quality blender.
customer_reviews.author: Gatito

customer_reviews.title: This performs just as good! Love
customer_reviews.text: Did a ton of research and this compares with a vitamix. This performs just as good! Love, love, LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Sushko

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: As good as a robot coup. This machine blends gazpachos as smooth a silk.
customer_reviews.author: henk roelink

customer_reviews.title: We always had lumps of berries in them and I was not pleased. I searched online for a better blender that ...
customer_reviews.text: We were using the small size NutriBullet to make smoothies. We always had lumps of berries in them and I was not pleased. I searched online for a better blender that could produce a smoother blend without lumps of berries. I got this one. Though relatively more expensive, it produces very nice and smooth smoothies.....no solid berries. We are very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Charles O. Dankwah

customer_reviews.title: Green Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use the Blendtec every morning for green smoothies. I love that I can put whole foods into my smoothies (carrots, lemon, apple) and the blendtec makes it super smooth. I have made some of the recipes in the included book that were delicious. I made cesear dressing and cauliflower (tasted like mashed potatoes) and tortilla soup. All delicious. It was alittle expensive - but I look at it as in investment in my health.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I've had it for a month and use ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I've had it for a month and use it every day, up to 3 times. It's so quick & simple, even the cleaning. I've make smoothies with seeds, cream soups, almond milk with dates, salsa....I'm eating out much less & healthier, as it's faster than ordering food, driving, etc., when I'm exhausted.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I honestly never thought I'd be excited about blending things but the Blendtec changed everything for me. Messy soggy protein shakes are a thing of the past. This blender works through anything I throw at it, with ease. This is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Drake L

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand grainy smoothies. Use this to replace a Ninja and Nutry Bullet. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: This is the best blender I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender I've owned! What a work horse! This blender is so powerful and clean up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: glad I went with this brand
customer_reviews.text: After doing lots of research, glad I went with this brand. I use it often and works great.
customer_reviews.author: QC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful blender!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this unit, we rarely used our blender. With this unit - we are blending different recipes several times a week. A wonderful unit.
customer_reviews.author: nwman97

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only bleeder I've owned that makes banana / kale smoothies without 'bits of kale' in the drink.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Labatte

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality blender and very powerful!. Just follow the recipes in the book and off you goes.
customer_reviews.author: Vu G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Brilliant! Very simple design, easy to clean and easy to use. Excellent for soups, smoothies and ice based cocktails! Thank you Pioneer Woman for recommending it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty blender
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy blender, has done everything asked of it so far with no strain.
customer_reviews.author: jonmac

customer_reviews.title: I am not disappointed in the Blendtec Blender
customer_reviews.text: It is everything that I wanted it to be. As time goes on I will use it more. When the fresh veggies come into the garden this blender will get a work out.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny Garland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST BLENDER EVER! Easy to clean and blends everything! The soup recipes that came with it are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing blender in the world
customer_reviews.text: The love of my life. Such an amazing blender. I make ice cream and Acai bowls with this all the time. The cleaning process is so easy. You simply blend detergent with warm water for 5 seconds and that's enough to kill all germs! But I lighting scrub it because I always add MCT oil in my smoothies. I definitely recommend this blender over others. It looks great and works great. The best part: you don't need to switch blades to blend dough, soup, ice cream, or chop up veggies. This one blender, one blade, and one container and do everything.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Shen

customer_reviews.title: A great blender!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that all the ingredients in my smoothies are completely blended, has made this an excellent purchase. I use the blender everyday, sometimes multiple times. It saves me time and I feel healthier having an easy source of preparing fruit and vegetable smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: It's everything you read and hear about!
customer_reviews.text: I have friends who did heavy research on Blendtec vs. Vegemix and they went with Blendtec. I followed suit, and I have been really happy with it. Spend the extra money and GET THE FIVE SIDED JAR!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: great product. does not look unattractive out on the counter all the time and works so convieniently and quickly to create great healthy smoothies. Cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: E. Weston

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in 2014, the motor burned out ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2014, the motor burned out in 2015. Until the motor died, it worked very well and did what I wanted, which was make healthy morning ice drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Grinds foods down, as advertised! I made a smoothie and threw the whole strawberry in, and you'd never know there were greens. I've made Orange Julius, smoothies and shakes and whipped cream. I like the easy cleanup and no sharp blades.
customer_reviews.author: M Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present to my wife. Since Christmas she has not stopped blender healthy smoothies and Almond butter.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Green

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: The features on this blender are amazing. It produces a very smooth drink no matter what you put into your smoothie. I'd recommend this to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well! The texture of vegetable juice is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Blended celery, carrots, tomatoes, cucumbers, avocados, spinach... Works pretty well! The texture of vegetable juice is so smooth!

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far this blender is awesome. We have yet to put it through hardcore paces, but has been relatively quiet, easy to clean, love the lid, and blends the heck of out my morning protein drink with frozen blueberries. Can't wait for making hummus and margaritas.
customer_reviews.author: Shoreline

customer_reviews.title: Use it almost everyday! From smoothies to roasted root ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it almost everyday! From smoothies to roasted root mash to batters for breads! I can't believe I cooked without it!

customer_reviews.title: The best and a beast...for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its very good well programmed... Touch screen awesome... Overall excellent product for the price. And best of all 8yr warranty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo excited to get this. I proudly display it on my counter!

customer_reviews.title: All Hail the Blender King
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blender. I Love how simple and easy it is to use. And the fine consistency that you can blend down to is unparalleled to what I've used before. Bravo Blendtec Bravo.
customer_reviews.author: Audio Dave

customer_reviews.title: Blendtec is the best blender on the market
customer_reviews.text: From our experience, Blendtec is the best blender on the market. We have been using the Blendtec for almost 2 years and had purchased one through Amazon for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Duenas

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between buying a Blendtec or a Vitamix. I bought the Blendtec Desinger Series and I don't regret it. First off the Blendtec doesn't need a plunger like the Vitamix. It blends everything super smooth and has a lot of power. Don't get me wrong the Vitamix is a great blender. But the Blendtec is a nice looking and easy to use blender. The only downside I see with it is that it doesn't blend small quantities or servings very well. I solved that by getting the twister jar which is a great addition for making thick but butters, hummus, etc and single servings.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Tsubota

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this product after using for some time. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. Works very well. Do need to remember to twist the blades or it has trouble starting up. Consistently excellent results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Blender
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, so far I have made only smoothies and they are wonderful. I love the design (looks like an iPhone) keyboard and it fits perfectly on my counter under my cabinets. Unlike other blenders which are too tall and takes up too much space. I would recommend this blender, it is pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cn

customer_reviews.title: Your last blender/juicer/thrasher!
customer_reviews.text: Probably too powerfull for my needs, but it works great! Shall try to make ice-cream tomorrow... Easy to clean, super sturdy! The fast speed kind of scares me though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karinski

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This blender is so awesome! It liquidfies everything. The touch button makes it fun because of the settings you can easily slide your finger to high and low settings.
customer_reviews.author: may

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect except for the loud motor.
customer_reviews.text: It basically does everything. But the motor is so loud that I have to cover my ears while its making my smoothie. But aside from that, I love it. It is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: zashi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: We had to get this replaced after a year. However, we use this blender 2-3 times a day. The exchange process was so simple. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Many blenders in the past now I have one that actually blends.
customer_reviews.text: Best blender out there. Buy USA products! Easy clean, easy use really enjoyed the cookbook. Have to try Popeyes icecream.

customer_reviews.title: Truth in advertising
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what they said and moore not a light weight mixes ice drinks crushes ice with ease and quiet

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely lighter and cuter than Vitamix. It's a lot shorter too.

customer_reviews.title: Blentec Vs. Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: The only short coming is the Jar lid does not have a tight enough seal. Other than that is is a fantastic machine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Blendtec Designer Series Blender-WildSide+ Jar (90 oz) - Professional-Grade Power-Self-Cleaning-6 Pre-Programmed Cycles-8-Speeds-Sleek and Slim, 90 oz, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Let’s talk about time for a moment, it’s the one thing in life that is given equally to everyone. Regardless of our circumstances, jobs, or family commitments we all have exactly 24 hours to use each day. Time is precious and fleeting. It will not wait for any of us to use it up or share with others.

Cooking meals and cleaning dishes takes effort and a lot of time. Day-after-day meals need to be made, and then the cleanup begins. It’s a necessary part of life. Blendtec blenders significantly reduce meal prep time and cleanup. When you buy a Blendtec blender you’re not only buying the world’s most advanced blender, you’re also buying yourself more time.

How can a blender give you more time? It comes down to technology and design.

Our advanced technology and jar design create a vortex, which pulls food towards the blade instead of pushing it to the sides of the jar like our competitors. With Blendtec jars, you won’t waste time tending your blends with a tamper to get all the ingredients down into the blades, and no tamper means one less thing to clean when you’re done.

Blendtec blenders can also heat your food during the blend cycle. For instance, if you want soup for dinner, a Blendtec blender can blend it up and heat it up at the same time so it’s ready to serve straight from the blender jar. No need to heat your soup in a pan. Can your old blender do that? No pan and no additional heating time means less cleanup.

Not only can Blendtec blenders heat your food, they can also make ice cream. Actual ice cream can be made with the exact same blender that makes soup.

Drinks, appetizers, main courses, and desserts can all be made with the same blender using the same jar. The time it takes to make each course could be measured in seconds not minutes or hours. Cleanup for an entire multi-course meal could be as simple as pushing the pre-programmed, self-cleaning button to wash a single jar, and just like that, you’ll be done.

There is a reason that having the world's most technologically advanced blender is worth every penny, it gives you more time to focus on life and the people who matter to you.

Do not use with power inverter or voltage transformer/converter
feature_bullets: Variable blending cycles: 8 speeds for variable speed control and the ability to achieve a variety of textures. Complete control to adjust your blending at any time while blending. Led display with 7 varying blending options, showing duration/time remaining on blend cycle.
Touch interface/reduced noise: touchscreen controls give the machine a sleek silhouette and are easily wiped clean. Reduced motor noise due to internal baffling.

Patented blade/80% thicker: stainless-steel forged blade, with wings, for amazingly smooth blends (10x stronger than other blender blades). note: Blade is not sharp, blade is dull. No more cuts and pokes.
Large batches: BPA-free Wild Side+ jar is a 90 ounce volume jar with 36 ounce blending capacity (wet or dry) ideal for blending beverages for 4-6 people.

Warming Soup/self-cleaning: Blendtec blenders heat soups and drinks through blade friction heat. Enjoy a warm meal or beverage in 6 minutes or less. Clean-up time: Add a little soap and water, your jar can clean itself in less than 1 minute.
8 year /American company: family-owned and driven to build the best quality products - without compromise. Engineered and assembled in the USA.
Electrical Ratings: watt 1560, Volts 120, Hz 50-60, amp 13, cord: feet 35inches/3 feet
